Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: POSB Everyday Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Doubles as an ATM and EZ-Link Card. Ez-link card has an Ez-Reload function.

Enjoy 20.1% savings at SPC, 5% cashback at Sheng Shiong, 3% cashback at Watsons, 3% cashback at AirAsia.com, 1% cashback on bill from SP Services, 1% cashback on StarHub, 1% cashback at Popular, 1% cashback on Comfort/CityCab taxi fares, 0.3% on everything else.
Cash rebate does not expire.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Up to S$120 Cashback:
1. S$70 Cashback when you charge a min. of S$700 per month for the first 2 months AND
2. S$50 Cashback when you apply for DBS Cashline at the same time

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Max cashback cap of $1 per month is awarded for SP Services and StarHub.

Max cashback cap of $50 at Sheng Siong per month. A minimum spend of S$1,000 on your POSB Everyday Card in a calendar month is required for 2% overseas cashback. Overseas cashback is capped at $10 per calendar month.

A minimum charge of S$300 in a single transaction for Singapore outbound flights purchased at AirAsia.com, excluding add-ons and any airport taxes, duties and fuel surcharges is required for 3% cashback at AirAsia.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: Up to 5% cash rebate with everyday partners such as Sheng Siong, SPC, POPULAR, SP Services, StarHub and EZ-Reload
2% cash rebate on overseas spend (min spend of $1,000, capped at Daily$10 per calendar month)
3% cash rebate on flights purchased at AirAsia.com (min charge of $300 in a single transaction)
0.3% on everything else

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: Get 5% cash rebate when you shop for your groceries at Sheng Siong
0.3% on everything else

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: Up to 20.1% savings on petrol at SPC (5% POSB/DBS discount + 10% SPC&U Card discount + 6% POSB Everyday cash rebate)
0.3% on everything else

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: 3% cash rebate at Watsons
1% cash rebate at POPULAR and UrbanWrite
0.3% on everything else

Details.Name: sc_main_image
Details.Feature: ./images/POSB Everyday Card.png
